task.summary: Default task
Refactor managements packages
Users profile now displayed by url /user and an id GET param
Correct an issue with encoding charset in mssql
Set a filter to forbid page for non-logged users
Improve the front part for seeing user's profile
Now the login page redirects to the requested page if you tried to access it without being logged
New method getUtilisateurByPseudo, in order to set a session JavaBean from only the pseudo value of the connected user
Set a session javabean for connected user. Ready to use !
Fix a tiny bug about GET param that shown null in the URL after redirection
Users can update their profiles. Tested.
Modularize the errors displaying as a template for users relative forms
HttpServletRequest errors attributes is now deal by the ErrorsManagement class
User can now delete their profile by GUI
Create BO for the actions
Create DAL for the auctions
Create DAL and BLL for all entities related to auctions. Not tested.
Refactor all DAO related files
Auction now can be created by users (tested)
End DAL of id 2004
End BLL of id 2004
Add a new method to filter ArticlesVendus by state of auction
List of current auctions is now displaying correctly. Filters needs to be implemented
Search in auctions can now be filtered
Improve servlet's comments
IHM for id 2005
IHM for id 2005
IHM for id 2005
Fix a bug with home redirection from ServletPostAuction
Can filter by user's current auctions
Can filter by user's won auctions
Can filter by user's current selling
Creation of a new state for auction that had not start yet. Created a stored procedure to run every minutes to actualize the status when the auction starts
change the previous checkboxes to radio inputs into the filters auction
All filters from homepage are now working (tested)
Update readme and .gitignore, add some commets...
Change button's color and now remove hours and minutes from data mgmt
Display auctions is working but raise on an auction is not implemented yet
If auction has not start yet, display buttons to update or delete for the owner (buttons are not functional yet)
User can now make auction on a sale (tested)
Add a stored procedure to update the state of an auction after his enddate
Add a logo and a link to homePage on it. Remove / servlet
Display informations about the winner of an auction on auction's display
Dwebsite is now responsive design for small screens
Session have now 5 minutes inactive interval before disconnection
Password are now stored hashed
Fix a lot of few bugs, update readme...
User can now update his auction before it starts (tested)
User can now delete his auction before it starts (tested)
Improve the dal between objects
